about_the_game:
Space Ops VR is not just a game, but a real-time training program for special operatives set in outer space! Do you dare to join this team of elites?

You are put in the shoes of a rookie who has just enrolled for basic training to become a part of the special ops team, whose main aim is to ensure the safety of a dangerous deep-space expedition.

Fight a lone wolf, alongside your friends in co-op, or hone your skills in player-versus-player matches: Find out who’s ready for the real battlefield.

Test yourself in the harsh environments of outworld deserts, compete with other rookies in the fight against aliens, and prove to your drill instructor that you’re the toughest!
So...show me your war face!You belong to Space Ops now!

Features:

  • Extended coop experience
  • Advanced skill-based matchmaking
  • Competitive PvE/PvP gameplay
  • Daily Quests
  • Survival mode
  • Unique futuristic weapons, with different damage types such as Kinetic, Beam, and Plasma.
  • Tons of grenades and gadgets to send your foes flying and make the enemies wet themselves
  • Customizable characters
  • Unique teleportation system to help you save your soul - or doom you - depending on the decisions you make

Space ops: Reloaded contains:

  • 4 Challenge missions that can be played in single, co-op or versus modes.
  • 3 Survival missions that can be played in single or co-op modes.
  • 5 Special Operations to play in single or co-op modes.
  • A total of 12 different missions
  • Dozens of side missions with epic rewards

    Available for arcade on SpringboardVR

highlighted.name: Assault Rifle : Weapon effectiveness is great

detailed_description:
WISHLIST THE GAME!


About the Game

Space Ops VR is not just a game, but a real-time training program for special operatives set in outer space! Do you dare to join this team of elites?

You are put in the shoes of a rookie who has just enrolled for basic training to become a part of the special ops team, whose main aim is to ensure the safety of a dangerous deep-space expedition.

Fight a lone wolf, alongside your friends in co-op, or hone your skills in player-versus-player matches: Find out who’s ready for the real battlefield.

Test yourself in the harsh environments of outworld deserts, compete with other rookies in the fight against aliens, and prove to your drill instructor that you’re the toughest!
So...show me your war face!You belong to Space Ops now!

Features:

  • Extended coop experience
  • Advanced skill-based matchmaking
  • Competitive PvE/PvP gameplay
  • Daily Quests
  • Survival mode
  • Unique futuristic weapons, with different damage types such as Kinetic, Beam, and Plasma.
  • Tons of grenades and gadgets to send your foes flying and make the enemies wet themselves
  • Customizable characters
  • Unique teleportation system to help you save your soul - or doom you - depending on the decisions you make

Space ops: Reloaded contains:

  • 4 Challenge missions that can be played in single, co-op or versus modes.
  • 3 Survival missions that can be played in single or co-op modes.
  • 5 Special Operations to play in single or co-op modes.
  • A total of 12 different missions
  • Dozens of side missions with epic rewards

    Available for arcade on SpringboardVR
name: Space Ops VR: Reloaded

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia GeForce 970 \\\\ Radeon RX 470 or better
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • VR Support: SteamVR
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-6700K / AMD Ryzen 5 1600X
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia GeForce 980 or better
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

reviews:
“Space Ops does look like it could offer some simple shooting thrills.”
UploadVR

“It's Australia simulator!”
JoshDub

“A very great VR Shooter, which makes a lot of fun against each other and in the team.”
Sandora & Vlaeg VR
short_description: Space Ops VR is a tournament in which Space Ops train their elite soldiers to fight for Earth against dangerous alien life around the galaxy. Space Ops VR, a brand new First Person Shooter can be played either in solo or co-op modes. PvP modes will also feature 1v1 duels or 2v2 team battles.
supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Japanese, Russian, Spanish - Latin America, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support
